projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
tirumaṉnṉvaḷara Irunila maṭan=taiyum
pōrccaeya-p pāvaiyum ciīrttanic celviyum
2taṉ perun=taēviyar āki iṉpuṟa
neṭuituiyialuūḻiyulḷ Iṭaiatuṟai nāṭum
tuṭarvaṉa vēli paṭarvaṉa
vāciyuñ
cuḷḷi-c cūḻmatiṭl koḷḷi pākkaiyum
naṇṇaṟa karumuraṇ maṇṇai-k kaṭakkamum
4 porukaṭal iīḻatt' araiacartam muṭiyum
Āṅkavaṉ ṟēviyar oṅkeḻil muṭiyum
muṉṉavar pakkal
teṉṉavaṉ vaitta
cun=tara muṭiyum Intiraṉ āramum
teṇṭicrai y-iīḻa-maṇṭalam muḻuvatum
Eṟipa
⌈ṭai-k kēraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ
kulataṉam ākiya palarpukaḻ muṭiyuñ
ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caeṅ
katir vēlai-t
tolperugkāval palpaḻantivum ceruviṟ ciḻavil irupattorukālavaraicu
8 kaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ mevaruñ cānti mantivaraṇ karuti iruttiya cempoṟṟirut taku muṭiyum payag
9 koṭu paḻi mika muyagkiyil mutukiṭṭoḷitta cayacigkaḻ aḷapperum pukaḻoṭum piṭi ira
10 ṭṭapāṭi eḻaraiyilakkamum navanitikkulapperumalaikaḷum vikkiramavirar cakkarakoṭṭamum mutirvaṭaval
11 lai maturamaṇṭalamum kāmiṭaivaḷar nāmaṇaik koṇamum veñcina virar pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭai
12 paḻana mācuṇitecamum ayarvil vaṇkirtti yātinakaravaiyiṟ canti ranṟol kulatti nti raracaḻai viḷiyama
13 rkkaḷattuk kiḷaiyoṭum piṭittup palatanattoṭu niṟaikula tanakkuvaiyug kiṭṭaruñ ceṟimiḷai oṭṭa
14 viṣayamum pūcurar cera nalkkocalaināṭu ntanma pālaḻai vemmuḻai yaḻittu vaṇṭuṟai colait taṇṭa
15 puttiyu miraṇacūraṇai muraṇurat tākkit tikkaḻaikirttit takkaṇalāṭamug kovinta ca ntan māviḻi ntOṭat ta
16 gkātacāral vagkāḷatecamuntOṭu kaṭaṟ cagka voṭṭal mahipālaḻai veñcamar viḷākat tañcuvittaruḷi
17 oṇṭiṟal yāḻaiyum peṇṭir paṇṭāramum nittalar neṭug kaṭaluttiralāṭamum veḷi malar tatta teṟipunal
18 kagkaiyum alaikaṭal naṭuvuḷ palakalañceluttic cagkirāma vicayottugkapanmanākiya kaṭārattaraicaḻai
19 vākaiyam porukaṭal kumpakkariyoṭu makappaṭu makappaṭum kaṭappaturimaiyil piṟakkiya perunetippiṟakkamu
20 mārttavankara nakara porttoḻil vācalil viccātira toraṇamum mottoḷipuna maṇipputava
21 mug kanamaṇikkatavam niṟai jī vijayamu tuṟainirppanṇaiyum vanmalaiyuraiyiṟ ceran malaiyurumāḻ kaṭalaka
22 ḻ cūḻ māyiriṭagkamug kalagkā valviḻai ilagkātopamug kāppuṟu niṟaipunal māppapāḷamug kāvalam
23 puricai mevili pagkamug viḷaippa ntūṟuṭai vaḷaippa ntūṟu ntalait takkor pukaḻ kalaittakkolamug kitamar
24 valviḻai mātamaligkamug kalāmutirkaṭuntiṟalilāmuri tecamu ntEnakka vārpoḻil mānakkavāramu ntOṭukaṭaṟ kā
25 val karumuraṭ kaṭāramum māpporutaṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakesarivanmarāna uṭaiyār śrī rāje ndracOLadEvarkku yā
26 ṇṭu 29 āvatu jayagkoṇṭacoḻa maṇṭalattu eyiṟkoṭṭattu nakaram kāñcipurattu tiruvekam
27 pamuṭaiya mahātevar makaḷ nakkaḻkotaiyāḻa kāñcipuranagkai tiruvoṟṟiyūruṭaiya mahAteva
28 rkku āṭṭāṇṭu toṟum putiyitutiruvamirtu ceytaruḷavum cattiracālaikaḷukkum palapaṇi nivanta
29 kkāṟarkkum putiyituṇṇavum veṇṭum vicattukku ittevar tevatāḻam ikaṇaiyūruro
30 m koṇṭa poḻḻāl āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum uṭaiyār perum paṇṭārattu kārā
31 ṇaiviṭagkaḻmarakkālāl aḷappatāḻa palicai nellu irupattaigkalam iḻḻel
32 lu irupattaig kalattukkuñ celavāka uṭaiyārkku amirtu ceytaruḷa arici kalamum neyya
33 mirtu nāḻikkum caṟkaraiyamirtu nāḻiyurikkum paruppamirtu nāḻikkum tayiramirtu
34 nā nāḻikkum puḷigkaṟiyamirtukkum miḷagk kaṭukuñ cirakamum mañcaḷukkum pala kaṟiyamir
35 tukkum vāḻaippaḻattukkum aṭaikkāyamirtukkumāka nellu mukkalane tūṇippatakkum kārā
36 ṇaiviṭagkatevarkku tiruvamirtukku arici kuṟuṇiyum kSEtra pāla tevarkum cūriyatevaṟkum a
37 ṟiñcizvaramuṭaiyārkkum kampi zvaramuṭaiyārkkum viṭelviṭuki zvaramuṭaiyārkkum arici nānāḻi
38 ppaṭiyum tuṟkaiyārkkum aṇukkappiḷḷaiyārkkum arici iru nāḻip paṭiyum ittevarkaḷu
39 kku neyyamirtukkum kaṟiyamirtukkumāḻa nelluk kalamum māṭāpattiyañ ceyvārkku
40 y kuṟuṇiyum tiruvārātaḻai ceyvārkku arici aṟunāḻiyum tevarā māṇikaḷukku arici tūṇiyum tiruppatiyamviṇṇappañ ceyvārkku aricikuṟuṇiyum tiruḻanir cumappārkku aricikuṇṇi
41 irunāḻiyum tiruppaḷḷittāmam paṟippārkku arici patakkun nāḻiyum tiruppaḷḷittogkaliṭuvārkku aricu mu
42 kkuṟuṇiyum tirumeykāppārkku aricitūṇiyum tiruppiṭamegak kāvitiraḻukku aricikuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum
43 civa tarumavācippānukkum śrīmaṟkirtti vācippānukkum stOtram viṇṇappañ cevānukkum sāma
44 vetam viṇṇappañceyvānukkum tirupūcaikaṭṭuvānukkum tiruvāykkeḻvi uṭaiyānukkum
45 civapaṇṭārikaḷukkum tevarkanmikaḷukkum tirumuḻḻaṭippārkkum tanmAsanañ cey
46 vānukkum vakkāṇikkum paṭṭanukkum āka patinālvarkku aricik kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum taḷai
47 va kala nel tūṇi pata vārkku arici tūṇiyum uṭukkai vācippānukkum viṇaivā
48 cippānukkum pāṭaviyanukkum kku arici kuṟuṇiyum tevaraṭiyārkku arici kalane
49 kkum arici eḻu kuṟuṇiyum arici tūṇippatakkum tiruppaḷḷiccivikaiyārkku arici
50 kuṟuṇi nānāḻiyum āḻai meyppārkkum kucavanukkum mālaikāranukkum aṇukki vāḷ māṟuvanukkum tevar ce
51 vi kum perāl arici iru nāḻiyum kku arici kalamum aṭikaḷ mārkku arici tūṇippatak
52 kum kālumpiṭāruñ ceyvārkku arici kuṟuṇiyum kku arici iru tūṇiyum paṭṭarkaḷukku a
53 rici tūṇippatakkum cāttirattukku aricikku aricikalane tūṇiyum maṭaiyarkku aricikuṟuṇiyum āka aricipatiḻ kalane
54 mukkuṟuṇiyināl iraṭṭi nellu irupatiḻ kalane tūṇippatakkum āka nellu irupattaigkalamum āṭṭāṇ
55 ṭu toṟum candrAdittavarai ittevar paṇṭārattu aḷappomānom ikaṇaiyūrrom
